subject: audio recording or editing software
author: Stefan Bion
full_text:
Hi Kathy,

there is for instance Audacity which is free & Open Source:

http://audacity.sourceforge.net/

However, on my system it runs very slowly, especially the waveform
editor, and the playback always starts with a delay of 0,2 seconds which
I find very annoying. But many people don't seem to have these problems
with Audacity, so it's perhaps a good choice for you.

Stefan

-- 

> is there any other audio recording or editing software that us poor people may be able to afford?
> Kathy
